mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, order_no, total_amount, status, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{orderNo}, #{totalAmount}, 'COMPLETED', NOW())
INSERT INTO order_items (order_id, ingredient_id, name, price, quantity) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{ingredientId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, oi.id as item_id, oi.name, oi.price, oi.quantity FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
SELECT o.*, u.username as userName FROM orders o LEFT JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
